trans-unit.source: Create a bouncing ball: Use the static collider and rigidbody components to create a ball bouncing on a floor.
trans-unit.target: Create a bouncing ball: Use the static collider and rigidbody components to create a ball bouncing on a floor.

trans-unit.source: Script a trigger: Create a trigger that doubles the size of a ball when the ball passes through it.
trans-unit.target: Script a trigger: Create a trigger that doubles the size of a ball when the ball passes through it.
